signup.text-v0: You just lost a loved one. Here is a safe space to gather family and friends, and celebrate their memory.
signup.text-v1: Start by telling us about your loved one:

inform.title: Gather and inform
inform.text:
inmemori allows you to inform family and friends about the passing of your loved one, and share the date, location, and details of the ceremony.
We can also help you collect funds to help with the funeral, or to donate to an organization dear to the family.

collect.title: Celebrate your loved one
collect.text:
Invite family members and friends to share their memories together.
inmemori is a safe place to post your photos and stories and remember what was so special about your loved one.
You can also send the family flowers and donate to charity organizations of their choice to show your support, in just 5 minutes.

how.title: How it works
how.text: inmemori is a free service that helps you celebrate the memory of the person you lost. In a few easy steps, gather family and friends, celebrate your loved one's life and remember together.

create.title: Create a page
create.text: Tell us about your loved one. Add a picture of them. Personalize it with words from the family. Include information about the ceremony. If you'd like to encourage friends and family to donate to a cause, activate the fundraiser feature.

share.title: Share it
share.text: In one click, publish the page and send it to friends and family. Watch memories come to life as they send in photos, write in beautiful memories, send their condolences.

manage.title: Manage it
manage.text: Manage the pageâ€™s activity (views, posts, donations). You can then download, print and share the memory book to memorialize the outpouring of love.

values.title: The power of healing
values.text: We believe healing, in the face of loss, should be collective, intimate and elegant. We want to create a space to celebrate and remember life.

collective.title: Collective
collective.text: Pages are meant to be shared, friends and family sending it out to one another. Gathering family and friends in one space has the potential to bring comfort to everyone in this moment of loss.

privacy.title: Intimate
privacy.text: Pages are private. Only those who received the link have access to it. Images and photographs you share will not appear in search results.

elegance.title: Elegant
elegance.text: The page is a simple and elegant guest book, designed to reveal the beauty of the stories and photos shared by your family and friends.

testimonial.title: Testimonials
testimonial.text: This is what people have to say about inmemori.

one.text: Your service is remarkably well done. It eliminated additional stress from our lives and our close ones were able to easily make donations to a charity dear to our dad.

two.text: Thanks to inmemori, we sent information about the funeral service to everyone concerned in one evening.

three.text: inmemori supported us in this ordeal and brought comfort through tributes and shared memories. The page in tribute to our mother is invaluable.

celebrate.title: Celebrate a life
celebrate.text: inmemori is a free service that helps you celebrate the memory of your loved one, and gather family and friends. We are here for you.
